document.full_text: a new hydration method for preventing kidney damage among patients who receive contrast agents during heart procedures was deemed more effective than the conventional way of flushing the toxic chemicals from the kidneys, researchers said on monday.
document.title: method protects kidneys from dye in contrast agents
lines_and_colors: a new hydration method for preventing kidney damage among patients who receive contrast agents during heart procedures was deemed more effective than the conventional way of flushing the toxic chemicals from the kidneys, researchers said on monday.
